aboutText:
I'm happy that I have the opportunity to live in the small town of Bad Driburg in North Rhine-Westphalia.

For more than ten years I have been working as a clothing designer, I also create homeliness using creative textiles of varying complexity.
aboutBottom3: with trendy design, impeccable tailoring and

main.pageTitle: Oksana Kuhn Design Studio | Sewing | Atelier | Textile [DISCOUNT for the first order]
main.coverTitle: Oksana Kuhn design studio with own atelier
main.leftText: I create designs for clothes and home textiles. I decorate interiors.
main.rightText: I develop a unique style that emphasizes individuality.

horecaTopic.pageTitle: Creation of a proforma. Sewing uniforms, tablecloths, sets, curtains [Own Fabrics and Atelier]
horecaTopic.vorTitle: Why is it worth contacting me?
horecaTopic.vor1Desc: I take measurements individually from each employee and pay attention to each individual's physical characteristics and wishes. The result is a figure-hugging and perfectly fitting piece of clothing.
horecaTopic.vor2Desc: I develop the individual design of the textiles and the uniform that fits stylistically to your company and harmoniously with your interior.
horecaTopic.vor3Title:
I ONLY WORK WITH
THE HIGH QUALITY
MATERIALS
horecaTopic.vor3Desc: I sew uniforms from natural materials. Your employees will work with pleasure and comfort in this clothing. I also use special fabrics that are easy to care for.
horecaTopic.vor4Desc: All orders are individually completed in my studio. I am personally responsible for the quality of the sewing and the cutting template.
horecaTopic.vor5Desc: I can choose the fabric for your order by photo and provide the cost estimate. This is how we save your time.

kleiderTopic.pageTitle: Individual tailoring in Bad Driburg [Own Fabrics] [DISCOUNT on the first order]
kleiderTopic.leftText: I design individual clothing items that accentuate your figure.
kleiderTopic.rightText: I create cutting templates based on your measurements.
kleiderTopic.mehrText: I accompany and advise the bride on all aspects of the wedding dress, and I also sew wedding dresses, bridal veils and much more.

heimTopic.pageTitle: Design and sewing of curtains, interior decor to order in Bad Driburg [Own Fabrics]
heimTopic.coverTitle: Textiles for your home and decoration
heimTopic.leftText: I style curtains that perfectly match the room décor
heimTopic.rightText: I create bedspreads, decorative pillows and bed linen
heimTopic.jobServ: I design and style for you
heimTopic.mehrText: I also sew tablecloths, head rolls and much more

aboutTopic.pageTitle: About | Oksana Kuhn — professional designer with 10 years of experience.
aboutTopic.title: Several people agree that success is impossible without happiness and pleasure
aboutTopic.text1:
Think about the important things that you enjoy doing. What excites you? What do you want to do every day?

People rarely get ahead in life if they don't enjoy what they're doing. Do only what your heart desires. Choose what excites you!

While working with my clients, I created my motto “create what inspires you”. Now I'll tell you what inspires me and what I create.
aboutTopic.text2:
Enthusiasm for me is such activity that makes you happy and brings joy to others.

I am happy to have the opportunity to be in the small town of Bad Driburg in North Rhine-Westphalia.

I have been designing and producing clothes and textiles for more than 10 years.
aboutTopic.text3:
I work with the latest fabrics from manufacturers in Italy, France, Germany and with world-famous brands of textile manufacturers.

Thanks to the knowledge I acquired during my studies at the Kiev University of Design, I actually implement many projects of various levels of difficulty.

I am looking forward to seeing you in my own design studio to give you professional advice.

contactTopic.pageTitle: Contact information | Oksana Kuhn Design Studio

rabbat: Discount for the first order: 5% off
vorteileTitle: Why you should work with me
vor1Text: My experience allows me to solve problems of any complexity. From simple clothing repair to complex restoration of products.
vor2Text: In my atelier there are more than 50 types of different fabrics. From them, vou can choose the one that ideally matches your product and saves time on searches.
vor3Text: If you need it fast, no problem. I can do it in a couple of hours or in a few days. It all depends on the complexity of the work.
vor4Text: All orders are sewn individually in my atelier. lam personally responsible for the quality of tailoring and patterns.
vor5Text: I can choose the fabric and provide a cost estimate based on a photo. This saves you time.
portfolioContact: A competent choice is the key to success. Therefore, I will be happy to help you!
